attributes.action: ask the Sports Minister to urge Liverpool Football Clubs owners Mr Tom Hicks and George Gillett to publicly assure Liverpool FC's paying supporters that Rafael Benitez has their full support and that his position as head coach is secure this season and next.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The supporters of Liverpool FC purchased new or renewed existing season tickets in the belief that head coach Rafael Benitez enjoyed the full support of the clubs owners Mr Tom Hicks and George Gillett. It would be a serious betrayal of these paying fans if Rafael Benitez was removed from his post this season or next.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
